Export.Routine:
#include INConst #include VARConst #include MEDConst #include VARDose VARDoseAdministracao quit OnBeforeButtonLine() set YOPTION = $get(YSEITE) &html< > quit OnAfterButtonLine(pYPARA) new idMEDPatient, idMEDAdmission, objMEDAdmission, barCode, Item, Lote, Prescricao, Linha, Dose, keyDose, Situacao, Dose, Via, Frequencia, Inicio, UltimaDose, ProximaDose, Validade, Prescritor, Duracao, LinhaPrescricaoStatus, LocalLote, Unidade, InfoPrescricao, idVARDoseAdministracaoLinha, idVARDoseAdministracao, objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha if (YSEITE = $$$abaConfirmar) { set idMEDPatient = $piece(pYPARA,",",1) if ($length(idMEDPatient) = 0) quit set idMEDAdmission = $$GetOpenAdmission^MEDAdmission(idMEDPatient) if ($length(idMEDAdmission) = 0) quit set objMEDAdmission = ^MEDAdmission(YM,idMEDAdmission,1) set barCode = $piece(pYPARA,",",2) if ($length(barCode) = 0) quit set Item = $piece(barCode,"@",1) set Lote = $piece(barCode,"@",2) set keyDose = $piece(pYPARA,",",3) if ($length(keyDose) = 0) quit set Prescricao = $piece(keyDose,"@",1) set Linha = $piece(keyDose,"@",2) set Dose = $piece(keyDose,"@",3) set idVARDoseAdministracao = $piece(pYPARA,",",4) if ($length(idVARDoseAdministracao)'=0){ set idVARDoseAdministracaoLinha = $order(^VARDoseAdministracaoLinhas(0,1,Item,$$$Index(Lote),idVARDoseAdministracao,""),-1) } if ($get(idVARDoseAdministracaoLinha) '= "") { set VORG(1) = $$$VARDoseAdministracaoLinhaObservacao(^VARDoseAdministracaoLinha(0,idVARDoseAdministracao,idVARDoseAdministracaoLinha,1)) }else{ set VORG(1) = "" set VORG(2) = "" set VORG(3) = "" } &sql( DECLARE Administracao CURSOR FOR SELECT Dose.Situacao , Dose.QtdDose||" "||$$SQLGetSiglaUnit^VARSQL(Dose.Unidade) , $$GetVia^VARSQL(Dose.Via) , $$GetFrequency^VARSQL(Dose.Frequencia) , $$GetInicio^VARDose(Dose.Prescricao, Dose.Linha) , Dose.UltimaDose , Dose.ProximaDose , Bundle->UseByDate , Dose.Prescritor , Dose.Duracao , Dose.LinhaPrescricaoStatus , Storage->Location AS LocalLote , Dose.Unidade , Dose.InfoPrescricao INTO :Situacao , :Dose , :Via , :Frequencia , :Inicio , :UltimaDose , :ProximaDose , :Validade , :Prescritor , :Duracao , :LinhaPrescricaoStatus , :LocalLote , :Unidade , :InfoPrescricao FROM Report.VARDose Dose INNER JOIN alSOH.dBundleStock Bundle ON Bundle.Item = Dose.Item WHERE Bundle->LotNumber = :Lote AND Dose.Prescricao = :Prescricao AND Dose.Linha = :Linha AND Dose.Dose = :Dose ) &sql(OPEN Administracao) &sql(FETCH Administracao) if (SQLCODE = 0) { while (SQLCODE = 0) { if ((LinhaPrescricaoStatus '= $$$PrescricaoSuspensa)||(LocalLote '= YLOCATION)) quit &sql(FETCH Administracao) } &sql(CLOSE Administracao) if (UltimaDose '= "-"){set UltimaDose = $zdatetime(UltimaDose,4,2)} if ($length(Validade) = 0){ set Validade = "-" } else { set Validade = $zdate(Validade,4,,4) } } &html<

#($$SQLGetDescricaoProduto^VARSQL($get(Item)))#

Dose: #($get(Dose))# Lote: #($get(Lote))#
Via: #($get(Via))# Validade: #($get(Validade))#
Frequência: #($get(Frequencia))# Quantidade: 1 #($$SQLGetDescUnit^VARSQL($$GetPickUOM^INUOMConversion($get(Item),"I")))#
Início: #($get(Inicio))# Duração: 1 dia
Próxima dose: #($zdatetime($get(ProximaDose),4,2))# Última dose: #($get(UltimaDose))#
Prescritor: #($$GetNomeMedico^VARSQL($get(Prescritor)))#
#($$GetInfo($get(InfoPrescricao)))# 
> } elseif (YSEITE = $$$abaOmitir) { set idVARDoseAdministracao = $piece(pYPARA,",",2) if ($length(idVARDoseAdministracao) = 0) quit set idVARDoseAdministracaoLinha = $piece(pYPARA,",",3) if ($length(idVARDoseAdministracaoLinha) = 0) quit set objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha = $get(^VARDoseAdministracaoLinha(0,idVARDoseAdministracao,idVARDoseAdministracaoLinha,1)) set VORG(2) = $$$VARDoseAdministracaoLinhaMotivo(objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha) set VORG(3) = $$$VARDoseAdministracaoLinhaObservacao(objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha) } quit OnAfterDataField(pYPARA) new lstHeader, Item, Lote, Validade, FmtValidade, Quantidade, idVARDoseAdministracao, Observacao, QtdDose, Unidade, Status, objMEDPrescriptionLine, Prescricao, Linha, count if (YSEITE = $$$abaLista) { do PrintJS set idMEDPatient = $piece(pYPARA,",",1) set idVARDoseAdministracao = $piece(pYPARA,",",4) set keyDose = $piece(pYPARA,",",3) if ($length(keyDose) = 0) quit set Prescricao = $piece(keyDose,"@",1) set Linha = $piece(keyDose,"@",2) set Dose = $piece(keyDose,"@",3) set lstHeader = "" set lstHeader = lstHeader_$listbuild("Medicamento","Lote","Validade","Quantidade","Status","Observação") do Start^COMTable(lstHeader) &sql( DECLARE DoseAdministracao CURSOR FOR SELECT DISTINCT Adm.Item , Adm.Lote , Adm.Validade , Adm.Quantidade , Adm.Observacao , Dose.QtdDose , CASE WHEN (Adm.Status = $$$VARDoseStatusOmitida) THEN "A omitir" ELSE "A confirmar" END , Dose.Unidade , Adm.Prescricao , Adm.Linha1 INTO :Item , :Lote , :Validade , :Quantidade , :Observacao , :QtdDose , :Status , :Unidade , :Prescricao , :Linha FROM VARDoseAdministracaoLinha Adm INNER JOIN Report.VARDose Dose ON Dose.Item = Adm.Item AND Dose.Paciente = :idMEDPatient AND Dose.LinhaPrescricaoStatus <> $$$PrescricaoSuspensa AND Adm.Prescricao = Dose.Prescricao AND Adm.Dose = Dose.Dose WHERE Administracao = :idVARDoseAdministracao ) &sql(OPEN DoseAdministracao) &sql(FETCH DoseAdministracao) set count = 0 while (SQLCODE = 0){ set FmtValidade = Validade if (FmtValidade '= "") { set FmtValidade = $zdate(FmtValidade, 4) } set objMEDPrescriptionLine = ^MEDPrescriptionLine(0,Prescricao,Linha,1) set count = $increment(count) do NewLine^COMTable() do InsertCell^COMTable("("_Item_") "_$$SQLGetDescricaoProduto^VARSQL(Item)) do InsertCell^COMTable(Lote) do InsertCell^COMTable(FmtValidade) do InsertCell^COMTable(Quantidade_" de "_$$Convert^INUOMConversion($$$MEDPrescriptionLineItem(objMEDPrescriptionLine),QtdDose,$$$MEDPrescriptionLineDoseUOM(objMEDPrescriptionLine),$$GetPickUOM^INUOMConversion($$$MEDPrescriptionLineItem(objMEDPrescriptionLine),"I",$$$YES)),,,,"CENTER") do InsertCell^COMTable(Status) do InsertCell^COMTable(Observacao,,,,,,,,,$$$YES) do EndLine^COMTable() &sql(FETCH DoseAdministracao) } &sql(CLOSE DoseAdministracao) if (count = 0) { do NewLine^COMTable("white") do InsertCell^COMTable("Nenhum medicamento adicionado para administração ainda.",,,,,,6) do EndLine^COMTable() } do Stop^COMTable() } elseif (YSEITE = $$$abaOmitir) { if ($$CheckBotao(pYPARA)){ &html< > } } quit GetInfo(strInfo) if ($length(strInfo) = 0) quit strInfo set strHTML = "
" set strHTML = strHTML_"
" set strHTML = strHTML_"
"_strInfo_"
" set strHTML = strHTML_"
" quit strHTML Confirmar() new strObservacao, strMotivo, strStatus set strStatus = $$$OK if (YOPTION = $$$abaConfirmar){ set strObservacao = $piece($get(^WWWDATEN(0,$$$KEY1($horolog),YUSER,YFORM,"M",1)),"~",1) do Administrar(YPARA, strObservacao) do GoToPage($$$abaLista) } elseif (YOPTION = $$$abaOmitir){ set strMotivo = $piece($get(^WWWDATEN(0,$$$KEY1($horolog),YUSER,YFORM,"M",1)),"~",2) set strObservacao = $piece($get(^WWWDATEN(0,$$$KEY1($horolog),YUSER,YFORM,"M",1)),"~",3) if ($length(strMotivo) = 0) { set strStatus = $$$MakeStatus("%1", "O campo motivo é obrigatório.") } elseif ($length(strObservacao) = 0) { set strStatus = $$$MakeStatus("%1", "O campo observação é obrigatório.") } if ($$$ISERR(strStatus)) { $$$DecomposeStatus(strStatus) $$$Alert(strStatus) do GoToPage($$$abaOmitir) } else { do OmitirDose(YPARA, strMotivo, strObservacao) } } quit Administrar(pYPARA, pstrObservacao) new idMEDPatient, objMEDAdmission, barCode, Item, strStatus, Lote, keyDose, Prescricao, Linha, Dose, objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha, idVARDoseAdministracaoLinha, Validade, Qtd set strStatus = $$$OK set idMEDPatient = $piece(pYPARA,",",1) if ($length(idMEDPatient) = 0) quit set idMEDAdmission = $$GetOpenAdmission^MEDAdmission(idMEDPatient) if ($length(idMEDAdmission) = 0) quit set objMEDAdmission = ^MEDAdmission(YM,idMEDAdmission,1) set barCode = $piece(pYPARA,",",2) if ($length(barCode) = 0) quit set Item = $piece(barCode,"@",1) set Lote = $piece(barCode,"@",2) set keyDose = $piece(pYPARA,",",3) if ($length(keyDose) = 0) quit set Prescricao = $piece(keyDose,"@",1) set Linha = $piece(keyDose,"@",2) set Dose = $piece(keyDose,"@",3) set idVARDoseAdministracao = $piece(pYPARA,",",4) if ($length(idVARDoseAdministracao) = 0) set strStatus = $$CriarAdministracao(idMEDPatient,.idVARDoseAdministracao) if ($$$ISERR(strStatus)) quit set idVARDoseAdministracaoLinha = $order(^VARDoseAdministracaoLinhas(0,1,Item,$$$Index(Lote),idVARDoseAdministracao,""),-1) if (idVARDoseAdministracaoLinha '= ""){ set objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha = ^VARDoseAdministracaoLinha(YM,idVARDoseAdministracao,idVARDoseAdministracaoLinha,1) set Qtd = $$$VARDoseAdministracaoLinhaQuantidade(objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha) set $$$VARDoseAdministracaoLinhaObservacao(objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha)= pstrObservacao } else { set idVARDoseAdministracaoLinha = $$^WWWNEXT1("VARDoseAdministracaoLinha",idVARDoseAdministracao,2) do ##class(alSOH.iBundle).GetBundlesForLot(Item,YLOCATION,Lote,,.Validade) set $$$VARDoseAdministracaoLinhaPrescricao(objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha)= Prescricao set $$$VARDoseAdministracaoLinhaLinha1(objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha) = Linha set $$$VARDoseAdministracaoLinhaDose(objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha) = Dose set $$$VARDoseAdministracaoLinhaItem(objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha) = Item set $$$VARDoseAdministracaoLinhaValidade(objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha) = Validade set $$$VARDoseAdministracaoLinhaLote(objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha) = Lote set $$$VARDoseAdministracaoLinhaObservacao(objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha)= pstrObservacao set $$$VARDoseAdministracaoLinhaStatus(objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha) = $$$VARDoseStatusAguardando set Qtd = "" } set $$$VARDoseAdministracaoLinhaQuantidade(objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha) = $increment(Qtd) set objMEDPrescriptionLine = ^MEDPrescriptionLine(0,Prescricao,Linha,1) if ($$$VARDoseAdministracaoLinhaStatus(objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha) = $$$VARDoseStatusOmitida) { set strStatus = $$$MakeStatus("%1", "Essa dose já foi omitida.") }elseif ($$Convert^INUOMConversion($$$MEDPrescriptionLineItem(objMEDPrescriptionLine),$$$MEDPrescriptionLineDoseQty(objMEDPrescriptionLine),$$$MEDPrescriptionLineDoseUOM(objMEDPrescriptionLine),$$GetPickUOM^INUOMConversion($$$MEDPrescriptionLineItem(objMEDPrescriptionLine),"I",$$$YES)) < Qtd) { set strStatus = $$$MakeStatus("%1", "Essa dose já foi completamente administrada.") } if ($$$ISOK(strStatus)) { set strStatus = $$$Save("VARDoseAdministracaoLinha",idVARDoseAdministracao_$$$COMMA_idVARDoseAdministracaoLinha,objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha,1) } else{ $$$Alert(strStatus) } quit ConcluirLista() new idVARDoseAdministracao, Linha, objVARDose, strStatus, Prescricao, PrescricaoLinha, Dose, objINIssue, keyINIssue, objINIssueLine, keyINIssueLine, pYPARA set pYPARA = YPARA set idMEDPatient = $piece(pYPARA,",",1) if ($length(idMEDPatient) = 0) do ClosePage(pYPARA) set idVARDoseAdministracao = $piece(pYPARA,",",4) if ($length(idVARDoseAdministracao) = 0) do ClosePage(pYPARA) set Linha = "" set strStatus = $$$OK set keyINIssue = "" tstart if ($$$ISOK(strStatus)) { for { set Linha = $order(^VARDoseAdministracaoLinha(0,idVARDoseAdministracao,Linha)) if (Linha = "") quit set objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha = ^VARDoseAdministracaoLinha(0,idVARDoseAdministracao,Linha,1) set Prescricao = $$$VARDoseAdministracaoLinhaPrescricao(objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha) set PrescricaoLinha = $$$VARDoseAdministracaoLinhaLinha1(objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha) set Dose = $$$VARDoseAdministracaoLinhaDose(objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha) set objVARDose = ^VARDose(0,Prescricao,PrescricaoLinha,Dose,1) set objMEDPrescriptionLine = ^MEDPrescriptionLine(0,Prescricao,PrescricaoLinha,1) if (($$Convert^INUOMConversion($$$MEDPrescriptionLineItem(objMEDPrescriptionLine),$$$MEDPrescriptionLineDoseQty(objMEDPrescriptionLine),$$$MEDPrescriptionLineDoseUOM(objMEDPrescriptionLine),$$GetPickUOM^INUOMConversion($$$MEDPrescriptionLineItem(objMEDPrescriptionLine),"I",$$$YES)) '= $$$VARDoseAdministracaoLinhaQuantidade(objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha)) && ($$$VARDoseAdministracaoLinhaStatus(objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha) '= $$$VARDoseStatusOmitida)) { set strStatus = $$$MakeStatus("%1", "A dose de "_$$SQLGetDescricaoProduto^VARSQL($$$VARDoseAdministracaoLinhaItem(objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha))_" não foi completamente administrada.") quit }else{ if ($$$VARDoseAdministracaoLinhaStatus(objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha) '= $$$VARDoseStatusOmitida) { set $$$VARDoseAdministracaoLinhaStatus(objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha) = $$$VARDoseStatusAdministrada } set $$$VARDoseStatus(objVARDose) = $$$VARDoseAdministracaoLinhaStatus(objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha) set $$$VARDoseAdministradoem(objVARDose) = $horolog set $$$VARDoseAdministracao(objVARDose) = idVARDoseAdministracao set $$$VARDoseAdministracaoLinha(objVARDose) = Linha set strStatus = $$$Save("VARDose",Prescricao_$$$COMMA_PrescricaoLinha_$$$COMMA_Dose,objVARDose,1) if $$$ISERR(strStatus) quit set strStatus = $$$Save("VARDoseAdministracaoLinha",idVARDoseAdministracao_$$$COMMA_Linha,objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha,1) if $$$ISERR(strStatus) quit if ($order(^VARDose(0,Prescricao,PrescricaoLinha,Dose)) = "") { //verifica se é a ultima dose dessa prescrição set $$$MEDPrescriptionLineStatus(objMEDPrescriptionLine) = $$$AdministracaoConcluida } else { set $$$MEDPrescriptionLineStatus(objMEDPrescriptionLine) = $$$AdministracaoParcial } set strStatus = $$$Save("MEDPrescriptionLine",Prescricao_$$$COMMA_PrescricaoLinha,objMEDPrescriptionLine,1) if $$$ISERR(strStatus) quit if ($$$VARDoseAdministracaoLinhaStatus(objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha) '= $$$VARDoseStatusOmitida) { if (keyINIssue = "") { set keyINIssue = $$$NextKey("INIssue") set $$$INIssueStatus(objINIssue) = 0 set $$$INIssueFromLocn(objINIssue) = YLOCATION set $$$INIssueCreatedOn(objINIssue) = $horolog set $$$INIssueCreatedBy(objINIssue) = YBED set $$$INIssueType(objINIssue) = 3 ;3-Dispensação / Entrega FINAL ao paciente set $$$INIssueChangedOn(objINIssue) = "" set $$$INIssueChangedBy(objINIssue) = "" set $$$INIssueCustomerID(objINIssue) = idMEDPatient set $$$INIssueCustomerName(objINIssue) = idMEDPatient set $$$INIssuePatientID(objINIssue) = idMEDPatient set $$$INIssueFREE7(objINIssue) = $$GetOpenAdmission^MEDAdmission(idMEDPatient) set $$$INIssueToLocn(objINIssue) = "" ;Não preencher o local de admissão como ToLocn, pois já está sendo entregue direto ao paciente set $$$INIssueReferrerID(objINIssue) = $$$MEDPrescriptionProviderNumber(^MEDPrescription(0,Prescricao,1)) set $$$INIssueDocketNo(objINIssue) = Prescricao set $$$INIssueReference(objINIssue) = Prescricao set $$$INIssuePosted(objINIssue) = "" set strStatus = $$$Save("INIssue",keyINIssue,objINIssue,1) } if $$$ISERR(strStatus) quit set keyINIssueLine = $$^WWWNEXT1("INIssueLine",keyINIssue,2) set $$$INIssueLineItem(objINIssueLine) = $$$MEDPrescriptionLineItem(objMEDPrescriptionLine) set $$$INIssueLineUnit(objINIssueLine) = $$$MEDPrescriptionLineDoseUOM(objMEDPrescriptionLine) set $$$INIssueLineQtyRequired(objINIssueLine) = $$CalcInventoryQty^INUOMConversion($$$MEDPrescriptionLineItem(objMEDPrescriptionLine),$$$MEDPrescriptionLineDoseUOM(objMEDPrescriptionLine),$$CalculateQuantity^INUOMConversion($$$MEDPrescriptionLineItem(objMEDPrescriptionLine),$$$MEDPrescriptionLineDoseUOM(objMEDPrescriptionLine),$$$VARDoseAdministracaoLinhaQuantidade(objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha))) set $$$INIssueLineQtyIssued(objINIssueLine) = $$CalcInventoryQty^INUOMConversion($$$MEDPrescriptionLineItem(objMEDPrescriptionLine),$$$MEDPrescriptionLineDoseUOM(objMEDPrescriptionLine),$$CalculateQuantity^INUOMConversion($$$MEDPrescriptionLineItem(objMEDPrescriptionLine),$$$MEDPrescriptionLineDoseUOM(objMEDPrescriptionLine),$$$VARDoseAdministracaoLinhaQuantidade(objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha))) set $$$INIssueLineNetworkInventory(objINIssueLine) = $$GetQty^INARTMENGE($$$MEDPrescriptionLineItem(objMEDPrescriptionLine),$$$NO,,$$$NO,1,$$$NO,$$$NO) set $$$INIssueLineLocationInventory(objINIssueLine) = $$GetQty^INARTMENGE($$$MEDPrescriptionLineItem(objMEDPrescriptionLine),$$$NO,YLOCATION,$$$NO,1,$$$NO,$$$YES) set $$$INIssueLineFromStorage(objINIssueLine) = $$GetEnderecoEstoqueDisponivel^VARSQL(YLOCATION) set $$$INIssueLineBundle(objINIssueLine) = $$GetBundle^VARSQL($$$MEDPrescriptionLineItem(objMEDPrescriptionLine),$$$VARDoseAdministracaoLinhaLote(objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha),YLOCATION,$$$INIssueLineFromStorage(objINIssueLine)) set $$$INIssueLineReference(objINIssueLine) = keyINIssue set strStatus = $$$Save("INIssueLine",keyINIssue_$$$COMMA_keyINIssueLine,objINIssueLine,1) if $$$ISERR(strStatus) quit } } } if ($$$ISOK(strStatus)&&(keyINIssue '= "")) { set strStatus = $$FirmSaleIssue^INIssueAuto(keyINIssue) } } if $$$ISOK(strStatus) { if $tlevel>0 tcommit do ClosePage(pYPARA) } else { trollback $$$Alert(strStatus) do GoToPage($$$abaLista) } quit Omitir() new idMEDPatient, objMEDAdmission, barCode, Item, strStatus, Lote, keyDose, Prescricao, Linha, Dose, objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha, idVARDoseAdministracaoLinha, Validade, pYPARA set pYPARA = YPARA set strStatus = $$$OK set idMEDPatient = $piece(pYPARA,",",1) if ($length(idMEDPatient) = 0) quit set idMEDAdmission = $$GetOpenAdmission^MEDAdmission(idMEDPatient) if ($length(idMEDAdmission) = 0) quit set objMEDAdmission = ^MEDAdmission(YM,idMEDAdmission,1) set barCode = $piece(pYPARA,",",2) if ($length(barCode) = 0) quit set Item = $piece(barCode,"@",1) set Lote = $piece(barCode,"@",2) set keyDose = $piece(pYPARA,",",3) if ($length(keyDose) = 0) quit set Prescricao = $piece(keyDose,"@",1) set Linha = $piece(keyDose,"@",2) set Dose = $piece(keyDose,"@",3) set idVARDoseAdministracao = $piece(pYPARA,",",4) if ($length(idVARDoseAdministracao) = 0) set strStatus = $$CriarAdministracao(idMEDPatient,.idVARDoseAdministracao) if ($$$ISERR(strStatus)) quit set idVARDoseAdministracaoLinha = $order(^VARDoseAdministracaoLinhas(0,1,Item,$$$Index(Lote),idVARDoseAdministracao,""),-1) if (idVARDoseAdministracaoLinha '= ""){ $$$Alert("Essa dose não pode ser omitida.") do GoToPage($$$abaLista) }else{ do GoToPage($$$abaOmitir) } quit OmitirDose(pYPARA, pMotivo, pObservacao) new idMEDPatient, objMEDAdmission, barCode, Item, strStatus, Lote, keyDose, Prescricao, Linha, Dose, objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha, idVARDoseAdministracaoLinha, Validade set strStatus = $$$OK set idMEDPatient = $piece(pYPARA,",",1) if ($length(idMEDPatient) = 0) quit set idMEDAdmission = $$GetOpenAdmission^MEDAdmission(idMEDPatient) if ($length(idMEDAdmission) = 0) quit set objMEDAdmission = ^MEDAdmission(YM,idMEDAdmission,1) set barCode = $piece(pYPARA,",",2) if ($length(barCode) = 0) quit set Item = $piece(barCode,"@",1) set Lote = $piece(barCode,"@",2) set keyDose = $piece(pYPARA,",",3) if ($length(keyDose) = 0) quit set Prescricao = $piece(keyDose,"@",1) set Linha = $piece(keyDose,"@",2) set Dose = $piece(keyDose,"@",3) set idVARDoseAdministracao = $piece(pYPARA,",",4) set idVARDoseAdministracaoLinha = $$^WWWNEXT1("VARDoseAdministracaoLinha",idVARDoseAdministracao,2) do ##class(alSOH.iBundle).GetBundlesForLot(Item,YLOCATION,Lote,,.Validade) set $$$VARDoseAdministracaoLinhaPrescricao(objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha)= Prescricao set $$$VARDoseAdministracaoLinhaLinha1(objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha) = Linha set $$$VARDoseAdministracaoLinhaDose(objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha) = Dose set $$$VARDoseAdministracaoLinhaItem(objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha) = Item set $$$VARDoseAdministracaoLinhaLote(objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha) = Lote set $$$VARDoseAdministracaoLinhaValidade(objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha) = Validade set $$$VARDoseAdministracaoLinhaQuantidade(objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha)= 1 set $$$VARDoseAdministracaoLinhaObservacao(objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha)= pObservacao set $$$VARDoseAdministracaoLinhaStatus(objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha) = $$$VARDoseStatusOmitida set $$$VARDoseAdministracaoLinhaMotivo(objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha) = pMotivo set strStatus = $$$Save("VARDoseAdministracaoLinha",idVARDoseAdministracao_$$$COMMA_idVARDoseAdministracaoLinha,objVARDoseAdministracaoLinha,1) do GoToPage($$$abaLista) quit CheckBotao(pYPARA) set Q = $$$NO if ($piece(pYPARA,"@",2) = "") set Q = $$$YES quit Q Cancelar() if (YOPTION = $$$abaConfirmar){ do GoToPage($$$abaLista) } elseif (YOPTION = $$$abaOmitir){ if ($$CheckBotao(YPARA)){ do ClosePage(YPARA) } else{ do GoToPage($$$abaLista) } } elseif (YOPTION = $$$abaLista){ do ClosePage(YPARA) } quit PrintJS() $$$StartScript() &js< document.getElementById('Y#(YFORM)#M4').focus(); /* function addEvent(obj, evType, fn) { if (obj.addEventListener) { obj.addEventListener(evType, fn, false); return true; } else if (obj.attachEvent){ var r = obj.attachEvent('on'+evType, fn); return r; } else { return false; } } addEvent(window,'load', OnLoadEstoquePrograma); */ > $$$EndScript() quit OnBlurMedicamento() do OnBlurMedicamento^VARDose() quit GoToPage(idAba) if ($length(idAba)=0) quit $$$StartScript() write "window.open('"_YAKTION_"EP=WWWFORM&YFORM=VARDoseAdministracao&YPARA="_YPARA_"&YSEITE="_idAba_"&YUSER="_YUSER_"&YUCI="_YUCI_"&YM="_YM_"&YBACK=&YBED="_YBED_"', '_self');" $$$EndScript() quit ClosePage(pYPARA) new idMEDPatient set idMEDPatient = $piece(pYPARA,",",1) $$$StartScript() write " window.parent.reloadPage('"_idMEDPatient_"');",! write " window.parent.closeModal();",! $$$EndScript() quit CriarAdministracao(pidMEDPatient, &pidVARDoseAdministracao) if ($length(pidMEDPatient) = 0) quit $$$NO new objVARDoseAdministracao, strStatus set pidVARDoseAdministracao = $$$NextKey("VARDoseAdministracao") set $$$VARDoseAdministracaoPaciente(objVARDoseAdministracao) = pidMEDPatient set $$$VARDoseAdministracaoEnfermeiro(objVARDoseAdministracao) = YBED set strStatus = $$$Save("VARDoseAdministracao",pidVARDoseAdministracao,objVARDoseAdministracao,1) if $$$ISOK(strStatus) set YPARA = YPARA_pidVARDoseAdministracao quit strStatus
